latest_articles.title: Troops for Gaza and money top agenda as Trump’s Board of Peace meets
latest_articles.summary: US president vows multinational force and billions of dollars as autocrats and rightwing allies gather in DC The US has proposed commanding a multinational force in postwar Gaza with troops from Albania, Indonesia, Kazak…
latest_articles.evidence: troops from Albania, Indonesia, Kazakhstan, Kosovo and Morocco

latest_articles.title: Lucas Pinheiro Braathen of Brazil and Mikhail Shaidorov of Kazakhstan Win Olympic Gold Medals
latest_articles.summary: A Brazilian skier secured South America’s maiden medal at a Winter Games the day after a Kazakh figure skater won his nation’s first gold in 32 years.
latest_articles.evidence: Mikhail Shaidorov of Kazakhstan Win Olympic Gold Medals
